item.title: Useful git commands
item.description: Useful git commands I am adding here some commands that were useful for me. Only add tracked files git add -u Amend commit with new files git add -u git commit --amend --no-edit git push --force or git commit --amend --no-edit -a to add the currently changed files. Keep fork up to date cd fork_folder/ git remote add upstream git://github.com/devname/orginal-repo.git git remote -v git fetch upstream git checkout main git merge upstream/main What is git rebase?
